Jack Erwin  
We needed to create a vision that provoked the same trust between cobbler and man. Guarantee quality, product - and lifestyle.
 

Jack Erwin is a direct-to-consumer luxury mens shoe brand. After two years of quick growtah and success, we were engaged to hone Jack Erwinâ€™s brand story. This meant rethinking their branded materials as a holistic system.

We evolved the logo mark, introduced consistent color and textures, art directed campaigns shot by Bjorn Iooss and Joss Mckinley, and introduced an intuitive e-commerce experience. The results was a brand that was confident, aspirational, understated, and truly reflected the men purchasing and wearing JE shoes.

  • Art Direction
  • Web Design
  • Brand Strategy
  • Web Development
  • Brand Identity

Welcome to Paradise.

One of the most widely accepted interpretations of Paradise is the Garden of Eden, home of Adam and Eve before they made a mess of it by eating some fruit. But there are as many notions of Paradise as there are people dreaming of it.

For some, Paradise is a hammock swaying between two palms on a deserted beach; for others, Paradise is an ice-cold beer at 5:15 on a Friday, or dinner and a movieâ€“minus the kids. Some people even find Paradise to be a town directly adjacent to the city of Las Vegas. Which it is, actually.

For us, though, Paradise is our design and product studio. Thatâ€™s what we called itâ€“Paradise. And it happens to be the source of literal Paradise for us, because here we get to take our vast knowledge and experience working in-house for some of todayâ€™s best brands, and use it to create new and supernaturally original ideas for others. Itâ€™s our background experience that sets us apart. Weâ€™ve been in the trenches and that gives us our edge.

In short, we know our shit, and thatâ€™s Paradise.

â€” Who We Are
Jay O'Neill Partner & Product Director Australia

Jay hails from the Gold Coast and serves as the head of product design. Heâ€™s lead product design teams at Billabong, Nixon Watches, RVCA, Tsovet and RAEN â€” and really knows how to conceive, create and produce a product. He recently launched Leader Bag Co. a premium baby bag company that has grown a fast following.

Luke Flynn Partner & Creative Director NYC

Born in Sydney, Luke leads is the creative director at Paradise with a a killer eye for branding & art direction. Heâ€™s has worked with brands and agencies including Saturdays NYC, Imprint Projects and Common Space â€”Â and launched accessories company Prize Pins.

Margaux Le PierrÃ¨s Partner & Creative Director

Coming from the great white north of Montreal, Margaux designs with a focus on brand and digital design. Margaux has been recognized by D&AD, The Type Directors Club and Awwwards for her excellent digital design and worked with leading fashion brand Judith & Charles to conceive their most recent website.

Yuji Tomita Development Partner

Yuji Tomita heads up our technology department and is responsible for all things digital. From the Pacific Northwest, Yuji started a winery in Argentina and helped launch Grovemade, a wood products company based in Portland.
